articles.author: Lorretta Chen, Felix Tam
articles.title: Chinese Developer Shimao Receives Wind-Up Petition in Hong Kong - Bloomberg
articles.description: Defaulted Chinese developer Shimao Group Holdings Ltd. is facing a demand to liquidate from creditor China Construction Bank (Asia) Corp., one of the most prominent examples yet of a state-backed bank trying to claw back money from a distressed developer.
